item.title: Airflow 3.0 Migration Guide: Lessons from a Large-Scale DAG Environment
item.description: Practical lessons from migrating to Airflow 3.x ahead of the 2.x EOL. Covers major breaking changes, a phased upgrade strategy, DAG compatibility approaches, and hard-won lessons from operating hundreds of DAGs in production.
